name: FIFA Manager 11
description:
The thrill of world-class football returns in FIFA Manager 11. Take control of an elite football team from dozens of professional leagues from around the world. FIFA Manager 11 features ratings of over 40,000 players and includes more than 13,000 original player photographs. Manage every aspect of your team, from signing players to writing contracts and setting your lineups, to devising winning strategies on the field, providing catering services, and dealing with the intense pressure from the media when things don’t go well.

FIFA Manager 11 boasts hundreds of improvements, including more realistic player attitudes and morale, more detailed on-field tactics, corner kick strategies, improved pre-game match screens, and the ability to compete for sponsorship and negotiate youth contracts. For new players who want to concentrate solely on managing the team and players, the new Just Football mode lets you jump right into the action by disabling the club management aspect of the game. Replay the 2010 FIFA World Cup in the separate World Cup Mode, designed to be played in less than two hours.
